titles.title: To protect private decisions about marriage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/30/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that government not be used to influence, promote, or coerce individuals' private decisions regarding marriage.
